statements: UPDATE customer_behavior_analysis SET behavior_type = 'Clicked' WHERE customer_id = 123;
UPDATE customer_behavior_analysis SET event_timestamp = '2022-01-15 08:30:00' WHERE customer_id = 456;
UPDATE customer_behavior_analysis SET behavior_type = 'click' WHERE customer_id = 123 AND event_timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
UPDATE customer_behavior_analysis SET event_timestamp = NOW(), behavior_type = 'purchase' WHERE customer_id = 456 AND behavior_type = 'click';
UPDATE customers SET name = 'John Doe', email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
